name: io.github.DigitalDefiance/ts-mcp-debugger
description: Enterprise debugging for Node.js/TypeScript with 25+ tools: breakpoints, profiling, hang detection

tools.name: debugger_start
tools.description: Start a new debug session with a Node.js process

tools.name: debugger_stop_session
tools.description: Stop a debug session and cleanup all resources

tools.name: debugger_set_breakpoint
tools.description: Set a breakpoint at a specific file and line number with optional condition

tools.name: debugger_remove_breakpoint
tools.description: Remove a breakpoint from the session

tools.name: debugger_toggle_breakpoint
tools.description: Toggle a breakpoint between enabled and disabled states

tools.name: debugger_list_breakpoints
tools.description: Get all breakpoints for a debug session

tools.name: debugger_continue
tools.description: Resume execution until the next breakpoint or program termination

tools.name: debugger_step_over
tools.description: Execute the current line and pause at the next line in the same scope

tools.name: debugger_step_into
tools.description: Execute the current line and pause at the first line inside any called function

tools.name: debugger_step_out
tools.description: Execute until the current function returns and pause at the calling location

tools.name: debugger_pause
tools.description: Pause a running debug session

tools.name: debugger_inspect
tools.description: Evaluate a JavaScript expression in the current execution context

tools.name: debugger_get_local_variables
tools.description: Get all local variables in the current scope

tools.name: debugger_get_global_variables
tools.description: Get global variables accessible from the current scope

tools.name: debugger_inspect_object
tools.description: Inspect an object's properties with nested resolution

tools.name: debugger_add_watch
tools.description: Add an expression to the watch list

tools.name: debugger_remove_watch
tools.description: Remove an expression from the watch list

tools.name: debugger_get_watches
tools.description: Get all watched expressions with their current values

tools.name: debugger_get_stack
tools.description: Get the current call stack with function names and file locations

tools.name: debugger_switch_stack_frame
tools.description: Switch the execution context to a specific stack frame

tools.name: debugger_detect_hang
tools.description: Detect if a process hangs or enters an infinite loop

tools.name: debugger_start_cpu_profile
tools.description: Start CPU profiling for performance analysis

tools.name: debugger_stop_cpu_profile
tools.description: Stop CPU profiling and get profile data

tools.name: debugger_take_heap_snapshot
tools.description: Take a heap snapshot for memory analysis

tools.name: debugger_get_performance_metrics
tools.description: Get performance metrics for the debug session
